subject: Character Teaser - "Wanderer: Ashes" | Genshin Impact
content:
When we place our hopes in something that does not belong to us, we doom ourselves to despair.

But if despair does not lead to destruction, something new will rise from the ashes.
contentOriginal:
When we place our hopes in something that does not belong to us, we doom ourselves to despair.

But if despair does not lead to destruction, something new will rise from the ashes.

subject: "A puppet consumed by a raging fire will leave behind ashes. As for what will emerge from them..." â€” "Eons Adrift" Wanderer
content:
Hello, Travelers~

Today, we will be introducing a new character, the Wanderer! A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.
contentOriginal:
Hello, Travelers~

Today, we will be introducing a new character, the Wanderer! A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.

subject: Voice Artist Announcement
content:

Voice Artist

JP VA: KAKIHARA Tetsuya


>>> Click here to listen <<<

subject: Genius Invokation TCG Gameplay Details: Basic Rules
content:
Hello, Travelers!

Version 3.3 will introduce the new gameplay "Genius Invokation TCG." This explanatory article introduces the rules related to this game mode, which include:


Gameplay Rules: Main Objective, Game Areas, and Duel Flow.

System Rules: How to increase your Player Level, how to get Character Cards, TCG Player's Manual, Card Shop, and Co-Op Mode.


P.S.: As there is a lot of content, it is best to read it using a WiFi connection.



*In upcoming versions, we will continue to track your gaming experience and make adjustments to ensure that the card game is well-balanced. We look forward to receiving your feedback!
contentOriginal:
Hello, Travelers!

Version 3.3 will introduce the new gameplay "Genius Invokation TCG." This explanatory article introduces the rules related to this game mode, which include:


Gameplay Rules: Main Objective, Game Areas, and Duel Flow.

System Rules: How to increase your Player Level, how to get Character Cards, TCG Player's Manual, Card Shop, and Co-Op Mode.


P.S.: As there is a lot of content, it is best to read it using a WiFi connection.



*In upcoming versions, we will continue to track your gaming experience and make adjustments to ensure that the card game is well-balanced. We look forward to receiving your feedback!

subject: Genius Invokation TCG Gameplay Details: Advanced Rules
content:
Hello, Travelers!

In the previous edition, we introduced you to the basic rules of Genius Invokation TCG.

This time, we're bringing you the advanced rules, which include the following:

Deck Composition

Deck Usage: How to Use Character Cards and Action Cards

Combat Actions and Fast Actions

Elemental Reactions

P.S.: As there is a lot of content, it is best to read it using a WiFi connection.

 


 

And that's all we have for the introduction of Genius Invokation TCG gameplay details. For more details on the game, we hope you can experience it for yourself after the Version 3.3 update. We will continue to bring you more Genius Invokation TCG tips, don't miss it!

And that's all we have for the introduction of Genius Invokation TCG gameplay details. For more details on the game, we hope you can experience it for yourself after the Version 3.3 update. We will continue to bring you more Genius Invokation TCG tips, don't miss it!

subject: A Thank-You Letter to All Travelers
content:
Dear Traveler,


This beautiful journey would not be the same without you. Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact received the "PlayStationÂ®Partner Awards 2022 GRAND AWARD."

We will be giving out Primogems Ã—800 from December 4 to December 7. Thank you for your support!


*How to Claim Rewards:

-Primogems Ã—200 shall be given out to Travelers via in-game mail at 00:00 (Server Time) each day from December 4 to December 7.

-These Primogems can be claimed at any time before the end of Version 3.3. All Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 7 or above can claim a total of Primogems Ã—800 via in-game mail.

Dear Traveler,


This beautiful journey would not be the same without you. Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact received the "PlayStationÂ®Partner Awards 2022 GRAND AWARD."

-Primogems Ã—200 shall be given out to Travelers via in-game mail at 00:00 (Server Time) each day from December 4 to December 7.

-These Primogems can be claimed at any time before the end of Version 3.3. All Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 7 or above can claim a total of Primogems Ã—800 via in-game mail.

subject: Event Wishes "From Ashes Reborn," "Oni's Royale," and "Epitome Invocation" Announcement
content:
Event Wish "From Ashes Reborn" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Eons Adrift" Wanderer (Anemo)!

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!



ã€“Event Wish Durationã€“

After the Version 3.3 update â€“ 2022/12/27 17:59


ã€“Event Wish Detailsã€“

â— During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Eons Adrift" Wanderer (Anemo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan (Anemo), "Canine Warrior" Gorou (Geo), and "Wise Innocence" Yanfei (Pyro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan (Anemo) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in the next Version.

â€» Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."


â€» This is for "Character Event Wish." The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

â€» The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

â€» For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.


Event Wish "Oni's Royale" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto (Geo)!

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

 

ã€“Event Wish Durationã€“

After the Version 3.3 update â€“ 2022/12/27 17:59


ã€“Event Wish Detailsã€“

â— During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto (Geo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan (Anemo), "Canine Warrior" Gorou (Geo), and "Wise Innocence" Yanfei (Pyro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan (Anemo) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in the next Version.

â€» Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."


â€» This is for "Character Event Wish-2." The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

â€» The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

â€» For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.


Event Wish "Epitome Invocation" - Boosted Drop Rate for Tulaytullah's Remembrance (Catalyst) and Redhorn Stonethresher (Claymore)!

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!

 

ã€“Event Wish Durationã€“

After the Version 3.3 updateâ€“2022/12/27 17:59


ã€“Event Wish Detailsã€“

â— During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons Tulaytullah's Remembrance (Catalyst) and Redhorn Stonethresher (Claymore) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During the event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapon Wavebreaker's Fin (Polearm) as well as the 4-star weapons Sacrificial Sword (Sword), Favonius Greatsword (Claymore), Eye of Perception (Catalyst), and Favonius Warbow (Bow) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During the event wish, use Epitomized Path to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as Tulaytullah's Remembrance (Catalyst) or Redhorn Stonethresher (Claymore). For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

â€» Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

 

â€» For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

subject: New Story Unlocked - Archon Quest Interlude Chapter: Act III "Inversion of Genesis"
content:
Wounded and defeated, The Balladeer has been imprisoned in Sumeru after his duel against the Traveler and the Dendro Archon.


Yet, no one knows how this special prisoner should pay for his many transgressions or even what to do with him after the dust has settled...


After reaching the corresponding Adventure Rank and completing the prerequisite quests, the Archon Quest Interlude Chapter: Act III - "Inversion of Genesis" will appear in the Quest Menu.


(After this quest is unlocked, access the Quest Menu by: pressing "J" on PC (default settings); tapping the Quest Menu icon in the top-left corner on mobile; or pressing and holding L1 on PS5â„¢ or PS4â„¢ to open the shortcut wheel and select the Quest Menu icon.)


ã€“Quest Start Timeã€“

After the Version 3.3 update, Archon Quest Interlude Chapter: Act III "Inversion of Genesis" will be permanently available.


ã€“Archon Quest Interlude Chapter: Act III "Inversion of Genesis" Unlock Criteriaã€“

â€¢ Reach Adventure Rank 40 or above

â€¢ Complete Archon Quest Chapter III: Act V "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

â€¢ Complete Kaedehara Kazuha's Story Quest: Acer Palmatum Chapter - Act I "A Strange and Friendless Road"


"PlayStation", "PS5", "PS4", "DualSense", "DUALSHOCK" are registered trademarks or trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.

After reaching the corresponding Adventure Rank and completing the prerequisite quests, the Archon Quest Interlude Chapter: Act III - "Inversion of Genesis" will appear in the Quest Menu.


(After this quest is unlocked, access the Quest Menu by: pressing "J" on PC (default settings); tapping the Quest Menu icon in the top-left corner on mobile; or pressing and holding L1 on PS5â„¢ or PS4â„¢ to open the shortcut wheel and select the Quest Menu icon.)

"PlayStation", "PS5", "PS4", "DualSense", "DUALSHOCK" are registered trademarks or trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.

subject: Character Demo - "Wanderer: Of Solitude Past and Present" | Genshin Impact
content:
Searching and seeking for an illusory obsession through countless nights.

With melancholy and misery as company, malevolent winds mean naught to him.
contentOriginal:
Searching and seeking for an illusory obsession through countless nights.

With melancholy and misery as company, malevolent winds mean naught to him.

subject: Version 3.3 Events Preview - Phase I
content:
Hello, Travelers~ Version 3.3 is coming!

Let's take a look at what kind of events will be in this new Version update~
contentOriginal:
Hello, Travelers~ Version 3.3 is coming!

Let's take a look at what kind of events will be in this new Version update~

subject: Character Demo - "Faruzan: Master of Ingenious Devices" | Genshin Impact
content:
Much of Haravatat's research revolves around a vast array of ancient scripts and codes, which many scholars find tedious and unbearable.

However, this doesn't seem to be a problem for Madam Faruzan.

"These incompetent students skim through some scripts for a few days and are already moaning and groaning. Ahem, I have been researching it for a whole hundred years!"
contentOriginal:
Much of Haravatat's research revolves around a vast array of ancient scripts and codes, which many scholars find tedious and unbearable.

However, this doesn't seem to be a problem for Madam Faruzan.

"These incompetent students skim through some scripts for a few days and are already moaning and groaning. Ahem, I have been researching it for a whole hundred years!"

subject: "Watch and learn, youngster!" â€” "Enigmatic Machinist" Faruzan
content:
Hello, Travelers~

Today, we will be introducing a new character, Faruzan!

A researcher from "one hundred years ago." She enjoys self-identifying as everyone's senior, and has significant knowledge of ancient scripts and machines of all kinds.
contentOriginal:
Hello, Travelers~

Today, we will be introducing a new character, Faruzan!

A researcher from "one hundred years ago." She enjoys self-identifying as everyone's senior, and has significant knowledge of ancient scripts and machines of all kinds.

subject: "Misty Dungeon: Realm of Sand" Event - Themed Character-Trial Event
content:
ã€“Event Durationã€“

2022/12/09 10:00:00 â€“ 2022/12/19 03:59:59


ã€“Event Rewardsã€“


ã€“Eligibilityã€“

Adventure Rank 20 or above


ã€“Event Detailsã€“

â— Seven trials with different themes await you in the Misty Dungeon: Realm of Sand. Two new trials will open on the first and third day after the event starts, and three new trials will open on the fifth day.

â— The character lineup you can select for each trial is different, and you can use the Trial Characters or your own characters to take part in the trials.

â— If you have the trial character, the said trial character in the trial will adopt the Constellation levels of the character you actually own.
contentOriginal:
ã€“Event Durationã€“

2022/12/09 10:00:00 â€“ 2022/12/19 03:59:59

ã€“Event Detailsã€“

â— Seven trials with different themes await you in the Misty Dungeon: Realm of Sand. Two new trials will open on the first and third day after the event starts, and three new trials will open on the fifth day.

â— The character lineup you can select for each trial is different, and you can use the Trial Characters or your own characters to take part in the trials.

â— If you have the trial character, the said trial character in the trial will adopt the Constellation levels of the character you actually own.

subject: Genius Invokation TCG Q&A
content:
Hello Travelers~

The new gameplay "Genius Invocation TCG" has been released. In this issue, we will provide Q&A tips about this new gameplay. Let's check it out together~


And that's all we have for this issue! To learn more about the gameplay rules, please see:

Genius Invokation TCG Gameplay Details: Basic Rules

Genius Invokation TCG Gameplay Details: Advanced Rules


We will continue to track your gaming experience, and make adjustments and optimizations to ensure that the card game is well-balanced. We look forward to receiving your feedback and suggestions!

We will continue to track your gaming experience, and make adjustments and optimizations to ensure that the card game is well-balanced. We look forward to receiving your feedback and suggestions!

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Wanderer: Any Way the Wind Blows" | Genshin Impact
content:
People often pray for a safe journey before embarking on a long trip.

But if the wind really listened to others, why would it still wander the world?
contentOriginal:
People often pray for a safe journey before embarking on a long trip.

But if the wind really listened to others, why would it still wander the world?

subject: Genshin Impact - Preview Page for New Permanent Gameplay "Genius Invokation TCG" Now Available!
content:
Hi Travelers~

The preview page for the new permanent gameplay "Genius Invokation TCG" is now available!


This preview page contains all kinds of official information related to "Genius Invokation TCG" which includes Card Display, Duel Guide, Card Archive, and other key features. Want to see more content on Genius Invokation TCG? Check out the preview page now!


This preview page will be continuously updated with "Genius Invokation TCG" content along with the development of Genius Invokation TCG in the game. Stay tuned, Travelers!
contentOriginal:
Hi Travelers~

The preview page for the new permanent gameplay "Genius Invokation TCG" is now available!


This preview page contains all kinds of official information related to "Genius Invokation TCG" which includes Card Display, Duel Guide, Card Archive, and other key features. Want to see more content on Genius Invokation TCG? Check out the preview page now!


This preview page will be continuously updated with "Genius Invokation TCG" content along with the development of Genius Invokation TCG in the game. Stay tuned, Travelers!

subject: Genius Invokation TCG Community Content Overview
content:
Olah! Hello, Travelers~


The brand-new Genius Invokation TCG gameplay mode is available! I've compiled all sorts of community content related to it, such as guides, popular discussions, and events with rewards. Let's check it out together!


= Preview Page =

Your one-stop shop for Genius Invokation TCG information~ A presentation of the gameplay mode, card details, guides for duels and various strategies await you! We hope it will enhance your Genius Invokation TCG gameplay experience!

>> Click to View <<


= Weekly Reward Challenges =

A new challenge will be available every Wednesday! Complete in-game duels within the time limit or share your tips for a chance to win Primogems, gift cards, and other rewards~

We invite you to share your Genius Invokation TCG guides for a chance to win merchandise, Primogems, and other great prizes!

>> Click to View <<


= Game Tools =

The Battle Chronicle and HoYoWiki have been updated to include the Genius Invokation TCG module. Here, you can view the cards you own, your Player Level, and card information.


= Highlights Compilation =

Our community will periodically release a collection of the best Genius Invokation TCG content created by our Travelers~ Whether it's effective game guides, fun discussions, amazing fan art, or exciting card duel videos, all these works have a chance of being featured!

We also invite Travelers to leave your works in the comments or recommend the best Genius Invokation TCG content!

>>Highlights Compilation: Genius Invokation TCG Special Edition (1)<<


= Trending Topics =

#Genius Invokation TCG Challenge Tips: Strategies for different types of duels that will help you become a skilled player!

#Genius Invokation TCG Character Cards: Everything about character cards, e.g.: Character Card reviews, recommendations for using Character Cards, etc.

#Genius Invokation TCG Anecdotes: Share highlights or interesting experiences in card duels.

#Genius Invokation TCG Deck Sharing: Share your deck compositions!

#Genius Invokation TCG Support Group: Don't panic when you encounter a tough opponent! Get some advice from fellow players.

#Genius Invokation TCG Co-Op Duels: Challenge friends in the community! Travelers from different servers must remember to add server topics when posting to find opponents~


Server Topic: #America Server, #Europe Server, #Asia Server, #TW, HK, MO Server

When looking for opponents, don't forget to clearly state in your post your Player Level, server, in-game UID and and the time you are usually online.

When looking for opponents, don't forget to clearly state in your post your Player Level, server, in-game UID and and the time you are usually online.

subject: Singapore Comic Con (SGCC) 2022 Details Announcement!
content:
Dear Travellers, Singapore Comic Con (SGCC) 2022 is coming!


ã€“Convention Informationã€“

-Event Duration: 10â€“11 December 2022

-Location: Sands Expo & Convention Centre

Genshin Impact Booth Location: L1-F10


ã€“On-Site Event: An Endless Journey With Genshin Impact!ã€“


>> Quest 1: Journey's Beginning

You can obtain a stamp collection quest card and a Paimon Chibi Sticker at the booth.


>> Quest 2: Teyvat Travel Notes

At this event, answer an interesting question about Teyvat from a corresponding staff member. If you answer it correctly, you will receive a character bookmark (you can choose one from Venti, Zhongli, Raiden Shogun, and Nahida).


>> Quest 3: Adventurer's Wisdom

Two Travellers to work together - one Traveller can only act out the character using expressions and actions. If the other Traveller can guess the name of the character correctly, the quest will be considered complete!


>> Quest 4: Your Best Friend Forever, Paimon!

You can take photos with the Paimon block figure at the Genshin Impact booth and post them on Facebook/Twitter, or other social media platforms with the hashtags #genshinimpact and #SGCC2022. After successfully posting, show it to a staff member to obtain a postcard.

Tips: You can receive an additional postcard when you cosplay as a Genshin character and visit our booth~

*All rewards are on first come, first served basis due to limited quantity.


In addition, you can also purchase Genshin Impact-themed merchandise at the booth. More information can be found in the image below.


We look forward to meeting you~

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Faruzan: Legacy of Knowledge" | Genshin Impact
content:
Ancient wisdom passed down to the present day should be treated with utmost respect.

The same goes for veterans with vast knowledge and experience.
contentOriginal:
Ancient wisdom passed down to the present day should be treated with utmost respect.

The same goes for veterans with vast knowledge and experience.

subject: TGA 2022 Genshin Impact Entry Video | Genshin Impact
content: Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact has won the "Players' Voice" award, and was nominated for the "Best Mobile Game" and "Best Ongoing" categories at The Game Awards 2022. Thank you for coming alongside us through this journey!
contentOriginal: Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact has won the "Players' Voice" award, and was nominated for the "Best Mobile Game" and "Best Ongoing" categories at The Game Awards 2022. Thank you for coming alongside us through this journey!

subject: A Thank-You Letter to All Travelers
content:
Dear Travelers,


Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact has won the "Players' Voice" award, and was nominated for the "Best Mobile Game" and "Best Ongoing" categories at The Game Awards 2022. Thank you for coming alongside us through this journey!

To thank you for your support, we will be giving out Primogems Ã—800 from December 10 to December 13.


*How to Claim Rewards:

Primogems Ã—200 shall be given out to Travelers via in-game mail at 00:00 (Server Time) each day from December 10 to December 13.

These Primogems can be claimed at any time before the end of Version 3.3. All Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 7 or above can claim a total of Primogems Ã—800 via in-game mail.

Dear Travelers,


Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact has won the "Players' Voice" award, and was nominated for the "Best Mobile Game" and "Best Ongoing" categories at The Game Awards 2022. Thank you for coming alongside us through this journey!

To thank you for your support, we will be giving out Primogems Ã—800 from December 10 to December 13.


*How to Claim Rewards:

Primogems Ã—200 shall be given out to Travelers via in-game mail at 00:00 (Server Time) each day from December 10 to December 13.

These Primogems can be claimed at any time before the end of Version 3.3. All Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 7 or above can claim a total of Primogems Ã—800 via in-game mail.

subject: The art of learning, thinking, and doing
content:
"I can't deny that he's very smart. However, it's a shame that a man of such talent only pays attention to the truth itself and not to the people around him. Or perhaps this is due to an extraordinary sense of individualism, which causes a lot of problems. For example, he doesn't seem to respect his seniors... Of course, I'm not referring to myself specifically."

â€” Kaveh


â—† Alhaitham

â—† Admonishing Instruction

â—† Sumeru Akademiya Scribe

â—† Dendro

â—† Vultur Volans




The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya. This title may sound very impressive, but it's really because the Akademiya has a culture of using official titles to inflate one's ego.

The role of a scribe may seem prestigious, but the truth is, a scribe does not have to be present at all major meetings, nor does he participate in core decision-making. The scribe is simply responsible for classifying and archiving important documents, and his presence is not required at all times. It is for these exact reasons that in Sumeru, where books and manuscript documents were once managed as a resource, the scribe is one of the people in the entire Akademiya who is in the know about various matters. In fact, one can say that this position is rather similar to that of the Grand Conservator. After all, the person who manages the various texts is the one who has privileged access to profound wisdom.

Alhaitham, the current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya checks all the boxes above. Not many people know who he is, but he knows a lot of information that is unknown to everyone. He does not attend any non-essential meeting, and when he does, he only records key points, jotting down other minute details based on his mood. People don't often pay attention to him, let alone know how much detail this scribe can detect in a simple meeting.

A capable person who keeps a low profile for too long is often perceived as someone with a mysterious identity and ulterior purposes. Alhaitham himself is a powerful rebuttal to all these clichÃ© views: he is a brilliant man, but he is only an ordinary employee of the Akademiya, with a stable job and a cushy house in Sumeru, leading a carefree and comfortable life.

Of course, I'm not referring to myself specifically."

â€” Kaveh


â—† Alhaitham

â—† Admonishing Instruction

â—† Sumeru Akademiya Scribe

â—† Dendro

â—† Vultur Volans




The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya. This title may sound very impressive, but it's really because the Akademiya has a culture of using official titles to inflate one's ego.

The role of a scribe may seem prestigious, but the truth is, a scribe does not have to be present at all major meetings, nor does he participate in core decision-making. The scribe is simply responsible for classifying and archiving important documents, and his presence is not required at all times. It is for these exact reasons that in Sumeru, where books and manuscript documents were once managed as a resource, the scribe is one of the people in the entire Akademiya who is in the know about various matters. In fact, one can say that this position is rather similar to that of the Grand Conservator. After all, the person who manages the various texts is the one who has privileged access to profound wisdom.

Alhaitham, the current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya checks all the boxes above. Not many people know who he is, but he knows a lot of information that is unknown to everyone. He does not attend any non-essential meeting, and when he does, he only records key points, jotting down other minute details based on his mood. People don't often pay attention to him, let alone know how much detail this scribe can detect in a simple meeting.

A capable person who keeps a low profile for too long is often perceived as someone with a mysterious identity and ulterior purposes. Alhaitham himself is a powerful rebuttal to all these clichÃ© views: he is a brilliant man, but he is only an ordinary employee of the Akademiya, with a stable job and a cushy house in Sumeru, leading a carefree and comfortable life.

subject: Cherubic grace blessed by the adepti
content:
Cherubic grace blessed by the adepti




"I wanted to give Yaoyao the magical device I used when I was younger, so she could protect herself. But before I could say anything, Cloud Retainer had already gifted Yuegui to her. Can't say I'm surprised. Yaoyao is a very lovable child after all." â€” Streetward Rambler


â—† Yaoyao

â—† Burgeoning Grace

â—† Disciple of Streetward Rambler

â—† Dendro

â—† Osmanthus




In the eyes of the people of Liyue Harbor, Madame Ping always brings the smiley Yaoyao along with her, and the two behave like a loving grandparent with her grandchild.

In reality, they are not biologically related. Yaoyao is the disciple of Madame Ping, also known as Streetward Rambler.

Although she is the youngest disciple of Streetward Rambler, she takes care of her other seniors like an elder sister.

It is no wonder that Xiangling often finds herself thinking, "Why does it feel like Yaoyao is taking care of me like I'm a child... Am I not the older one here?"

Even before becoming an adeptus's disciple, Yaoyao was always a warmhearted and considerate child. Perhaps it is for this very reason that the adepti are all very fond of her.

Yuegui, who never leaves her side, is an adepti treasure, crafted by Cloud Retainer herself. Yuegui protects Yaoyao whenever she encounters danger. It is just another testimony of the affection that the adepti have for her.

Yaoyao is talented and driven, the kind of student teachers dream of. Although she has had some embarrassing moments due to her not fully grasping the knowledge learned, this young child will no doubt blossom into a cultured and knowledgeable lady.

Madame Ping is proud to have a disciple like her by her side.

â—† Dendro

â—† Osmanthus

In reality, they are not biologically related. Yaoyao is the disciple of Madame Ping, also known as Streetward Rambler.

Even before becoming an adeptus's disciple, Yaoyao was always a warmhearted and considerate child. Perhaps it is for this very reason that the adepti are all very fond of her.

Yuegui, who never leaves her side, is an adepti treasure, crafted by Cloud Retainer herself. Yuegui protects Yaoyao whenever she encounters danger. It is just another testimony of the affection that the adepti have for her.

Madame Ping is proud to have a disciple like her by her side.

subject: "Akitsu Kimodameshi" Event: Take Part and Obtain the Event-Exclusive Weapon, Toukabou Shigure (Sword)
content:
ã€“Event Gameplay Durationã€“

2022/12/15 10:00:00 â€“ 2023/01/02 03:59:59


ã€“Event Rewardsã€“


ã€“Eligibilityã€“

Adventure Rank 30 or above

Complete the "Ritou Escape Plan" part of Archon Quest: "Chapter II: Act I."

â€» Complete Arataki Itto's Story Quest "Taurus Iracundus Chapter: Act I - "Rise Up, Golden Soul" for a better experience.

â€» If you have not completed Arataki Itto's Story Quest "Taurus Iracundus Chapter: Act I - "Rise Up, Golden Soul" during the event, you can enter the event through "Quick Start" in the event page.


ã€“Event Detailsã€“

â— Two new Leisurely Pastime and one new Shatterdark challenges will be available upon the first, third, and fifth days of the event. Players will have to complete all challenges under Playful Leisure difficulty in the corresponding stages of Leisurely Pastime to unlock the corresponding Shatterdark challenge.

â— Complete designated challenges in Leisurely Pastime and Shatterdark to claim Primogems, the event-exclusive weapon Toukabou Shigure (Sword), Courage Test Tickets, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora. Courage Test Tickets can be used to exchange for rewards such as Parasol Talcum, Crown of Insight, Weapon Ascension Materials, and Talent Level-Up Materials from the Event Shop.

â— Complete the "Akitsu Kimodameshi" quest chain to obtain rewards such as Primogems, the Furnishing "Kimodameshi Vivaciousness," and Hero's Wit.

â— After the event gameplay period ends, Courage Test Tickets will disappear. Please make sure to claim the rewards in time.

subject: Story Teaser: Akitsu Haneasobi | Genshin Impact
content:
Simply put, Akitsu Haneasobi is a game where you use hagoita to hit a ball towards a set target, which tests one's speed, endurance, and directional control.

You can play this game alone, but if you want to cooperate or compete with someone else, you will need to find the right partner to enjoy it fully.


VA

Youko - Courtney Lin

Kamai Kenji - Kit Harrison

Yanagibashi Takuto - DW McCann

Hanyuuda Chizuru - Carrie Keranan

Kamai Kenji - Kit Harrison

Yanagibashi Takuto - DW McCann

Hanyuuda Chizuru - Carrie Keranan

content:

Thank you for all your efforts and dedication this year. Every moment we spend together gives more meaning to our journey.


Take part in the web event, send and receive your own winter wishes to receive Mora.

*Travelers can scroll or swipe down the page to view more event details.

subject: "Windtrace" Event: Compete and Earn Primogems
content:
ã€“Event Durationã€“

2022/12/23 10:00:00 â€“ 2023/01/06 03:59:59


ã€“Event Rewardsã€“

ã€“Eligibilityã€“

Adventure Rank 20 or above


ã€“Event Detailsã€“

â— On the first day of the event, the maximum number of Windtrace Coins you can obtain is 1,200. This amount will increase gradually for each of the 6 days after that, up to a maximum of 6,000 Windtrace Coins. Use the matching function to find randomized games and obtain Windtrace Coins.

â— Accumulate certain amounts of Windtrace Coins or complete Windtrace Challenges to claim the corresponding rewards.

â— When participating in Windtrace, the unlocked "Contested Zone" will be randomly selected for the game. Travelers can change the selected map through the preview of the "Contested Zone" in the game overview. Contested Zones that have yet to be unlocked cannot be selected.

â— Travelers can unlock the "Contested Zone" by unlocking the Statue of the Seven in the coresponding area. The "Contested Zones" in Inazuma can only be unlocked by completing the Quest "Ritou Escape Plan" and unlocking the Statue of the Seven in the area. Travelers can view the currently unlocked content through the preview of the "Contested Zone" in the game overview.

â€» Windtrace Coins can only be obtained while playing in randomized games using the matching function. You can play the game and complete Windtrace Challenges in a custom Co-Op party, but will be unable to obtain Windtrace Coins.

subject: Event Wishes "Reign of Serenity," "Azure Excursion," and "Epitome Invocation" Announcement
content:
Event Wish "Reign of Serenity" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Plane of Euthymia" Raiden Shogun (Electro)!

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

 

ã€“Event Wish Durationã€“

2022/12/27 18:00â€”2023/1/17 14:59


ã€“Event Wish Detailsã€“

â— During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Plane of Euthymia" Raiden Shogun (Electro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria (Cryo), "Mujina Ninja" Sayu (Anemo), and "Crowfeather Kaburaya" Kujou Sara (Electro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â€» Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

â€» This is for "Character Event Wish." The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

â€» The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

â€» For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.





Event Wish "Azure Excursion" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Pillar of Fortitude" Kamisato Ayato (Hydro)!

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

 

ã€“Event Wish Durationã€“

2022/12/27 18:00â€”2023/1/17 14:59


ã€“Event Wish Detailsã€“

â— During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Pillar of Fortitude" Kamisato Ayato (Hydro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria (Cryo), "Mujina Ninja" Sayu (Anemo), and "Crowfeather Kaburaya" Kujou Sara (Electro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â€» Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

â€» This is for "Character Event Wish-2." The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

â€» The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

â€» For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.





Event Wish "Epitome Invocation" - Boosted Drop Rate for Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) and Haran Geppaku Futsu (Sword)ï¼

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!


ã€“Event Wish Durationã€“

2022/12/27 18:00:00â€”2023/01/17 14:59:59


ã€“Event Wish Detailsã€“

â— During the event, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) and Haran Geppaku Futsu (Sword) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During the event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons Akuoumaru (Claymore) and Mouun's Moon (Bow) as well as the 4-star weapons Lion's Roar (Sword), Favonius Lance (Polearm), and Sacrificial Fragments (Catalyst) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During the event wish, use Epitomized Path to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) or Haran Geppaku Futsu (Sword). For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

â€» Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

 

â€» For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

2022/12/27 18:00:00â€”2023/01/17 14:59:59


ã€“Event Wish Detailsã€“

â— During the event, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) and Haran Geppaku Futsu (Sword) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During the event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons Akuoumaru (Claymore) and Mouun's Moon (Bow) as well as the 4-star weapons Lion's Roar (Sword), Favonius Lance (Polearm), and Sacrificial Fragments (Catalyst) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

â— During the event wish, use Epitomized Path to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) or Haran Geppaku Futsu (Sword). For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

â€» Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

 

â€» For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

subject: "All Senses Clear, All Existence Void" Version 3.3 Events Preview - Phase II
content: Hello Travelers! Let's take a look at the upcoming events!
contentOriginal: Hello Travelers! Let's take a look at the upcoming events!

subject: Genshin Impact EP - Strolling Beneath a Moon Awaiting Spring
content:
At year's end, the cold winds utter breaths of absolute silence as fallen leaves encase the world entire.

But between the forest and the deeper wilds still, the faintest sound of new shoots sprouting free can be heard.

As such, even if the Yashiro Commission's duties are the same as they were during days more ordinary, they still instill one with a sense of greater promise.
contentOriginal:
At year's end, the cold winds utter breaths of absolute silence as fallen leaves encase the world entire.

But between the forest and the deeper wilds still, the faintest sound of new shoots sprouting free can be heard.

As such, even if the Yashiro Commission's duties are the same as they were during days more ordinary, they still instill one with a sense of greater promise.
